title: 2 low grade Type II Coupons Price drop
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: 2 low grade Type II Coupons Price drop
posts.post_content:
Hi, I would like to sell a couple of low grade Type II Coupon cards.

Paskert has a decent front, but most of the back is missing, except for a small portion of the bottom.  $15  Paskert is sold.  Thank you, Adam!

Oldring is rough with major paper loss on the back.   $20

Any type of payment is fine.  Shipping is free.

Please respond by email.  [url]rickmcquillan@gmail.com[/url]

Will trade for other Type II's or Weil Baking.

Thank you.  Rick

posts.post_title: Feel free to make an offer.

posts.post_content: Rick, I'll take the Paskert if it's still available? Email sent.
